alert.note: Alert for Boone; Hamilton; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 12:11AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webster, north central Boone and southwestern Hamilton Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Gowrie, or 13 miles southeast of Fort Dodge, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Dodge, Dayton, Stratford, Coalville, Otho, Stanhope, Lehigh, Duncombe, Moorland, Woodman Hollow State Park, Dolliver Memorial State Park, Lizard Creek State Recreation Area and Brushy Creek St Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
